objective.title: Phase 7: Testing, Documentation & Deployment
objective.description: Comprehensive testing, documentation, and production deployment preparation

custom_requirements:
**Phase 7 Objectives:**
Complete comprehensive testing, documentation, and production deployment preparation for the sophisticated rule orchestration platform.

**Key Deliverables:**
1. Comprehensive test suite (unit, integration, performance)
2. Complete system documentation and API reference
3. Deployment guides and operational procedures
4. Performance benchmarking and validation
5. Security testing and penetration testing
6. Production deployment and monitoring setup

**Technical Requirements:**
- Achieve 95%+ test coverage across all components
- Implement comprehensive integration testing
- Perform load testing and performance validation
- Create detailed API documentation and examples
- Develop deployment automation and CI/CD pipelines
- Implement monitoring and alerting systems
- Conduct security audits and penetration testing

**Success Criteria:**
- All tests passing with 95%+ coverage
- Complete documentation for all features
- Successful deployment to production environment
- Performance benchmarks meeting requirements
- Security audit passed with no critical issues
- Monitoring and alerting systems operational

next_steps: Set up development environment if needed

agent_insights.content: Phase 7 Testing Strategy Analysis: System has reached 90.9% completion with Phase 6 compliance integration complete. Need comprehensive testing of: 1) Enhanced rule orchestrator with nested loading 2) Phase 6 compliance integration 3) Backward compatibility validation 4) Performance under load 5) Security controls 6) MCP tool ecosystem. Target: 95%+ test coverage with integration, performance, and security testing.
